structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
PUBLIC WORKS IN CITIES OF THE FIRST CLASS (Superseded)

law.history: Repealed 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 234, sec. 11; and ch. 239, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1980; amended ch. 396, sec. 57. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2839.

metadata.lrc-note: . This section was amended in Acts 1980, ch. 396, Â§ 57 and repealed in Acts 1980, ch. 234, Â§ 11 and ch. 239, Â§ 4. The repeals prevail as they were the later enactments.
